BLOCK.QRY: insert into PISWFD_EMP_REG (EWF_ID, STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE, DT_OF_JOINING_EWF, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_MONTHLY_DED, STR_DED_STATUS, DT_DED_STOP, NOMINEE_NUM_SL_NO, NOMINEE_PERCENTAGE, NOMINEE_MAP_NUM_SL_NO) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE piswfd_emp_reg a SET a.NOMINEE_PERCENTAGE=? , a.DT_OF_JOINING_EWF=?, a.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, a.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE a.EWF_ID=? AND a.NOMINEE_NUM_SL_NO=? and A.GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE piswfd_emp_reg a SET a.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE a.EWF_ID=? AND A.GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM piswfd_emp_reg a WHERE a.EWF_ID=? AND A.GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE piswfd_emp_reg a SET a.NUM_MONTHLY_DED=? WHERE A.GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
